parameters.name: Item
parameters.description: 0-based index number of the currently selected item (see Remarks )

title: IPropertyManagerPageSelectionbox.SelectionIndex
description: Gets the index number of the currently selected item in the selection box.

parameters.name: Item
parameters.description: 0-based index number of the currently selected item (see Remarks )

returns: 1-based index number to use with ISelectionMgr APIs (see Remarks )
remarks:
Use:
IPropertyManagerPageSelectionbox::ItemCount
to get the number of items in the selection box.
the return value Index with such ISelectionMgr APIs as
ISelectionMgr::GetSelectedObject6
and
ISelectionMgr::GetSelectedObjectType3
.
